siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Writer is beautiful, secure and fast text editor and notes app for iPhone, iPad and soon for Mac and Apple Watch. It has many features like Markdown support, syncing between devices via secure Apple Cloud, customizable typography and more...
blogPost.body: Writer is beautiful, secure and fast text editor and notes app for iPhone, iPad and soon for Mac and Apple Watch. It has many features like Markdown support, syncing between devices via secure Apple Cloud, customizable typography and more...
blogPost.title: Writer - Beautiful, fast, Apple native notes app with Markdown
blogPost.author: Michal Jach

localize.description: Writer是一款美观、安全、快速的文本编辑和笔记应用，适用于iPhone、iPad，不久还适用于Mac和Apple Watch。它有许多功能，如Markdown支持，通过安全的Apple Cloud在设备之间同步，可定制的排版等等。
localize.tagline: 美丽、快速、带Markdown的苹果原生笔记应用。

localize.description: Writer是一款美觀、安全、快速的文本編輯和筆記應用，適用於iPhone、iPad，不久還適用於Mac和Apple Watch。它有許多功能，如Markdown支持，通過安全的Apple Cloud在設備之間同步，可定製的排版等等。
localize.tagline: 美麗、快速、帶Markdown的蘋果原生筆記應用。

previous.excerpt: Product Buffs equips teams with the skills and knowledge they need to build the best possible propositions through 5 weeks of hands-on product discovery coaching.
previous.title: Product Buffs - We help teams avoid building the wrong product

localize.description: Product Buffs通过5周的产品发现实践辅导，为团队提供建立最佳主张所需的技能和知识。
localize.tagline: 我们帮助团队避免构建错误的产品

localize.description: Product Buffs通過5周的產品發現實踐輔導，爲團隊提供建立最佳主張所需的技能和知識。
localize.tagline: 我們幫助團隊避免構建錯誤的產品

localize.tagline: 爲重要的事情留出時間
